chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A (Union A P Q) R <-> Disjoint A P R /\ Disjoint A Q R

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For Cj: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit
Union : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Ensemble U
Disjoint : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Fin.R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [ |- nat]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
Union_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))
Intersection_Union_distr_r : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P (Union A Q R)) (Union A (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A P R))
Intersection_Union_distr_l : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Union A Q R) P) (Union A (Intersection A Q P) (Intersection A R P))
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Included_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q P' Q' : Ensemble A), Included P P' -> Included Q Q' -> Disjoint A P' Q' -> Disjoint A P Q
Union_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included (Union ?A P Q) R < -> Included P R /\ Included Q R where ?A : [ |- Type]
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
right_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included Q (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
left_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included P (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
List.Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), List.Forall2 R nil nil
Complement_Included_rev : forall (U : Type) (P Q : Ensemble U), Included P Q -> Included (Complement U Q) (Complement U P)
ssrbool.pair_andP : forall P Q : Prop, P /\ Q < -> P * Q
List.Forall2_cons : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l')
OrderedRing.SORsetoid : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> Setoid.Setoid_Theory R req
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
Field_theory.PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
OrderedRing.SORlt_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rlt x1 y1 < -> rlt x2 y2
OrderedRing.SORle_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> rle x1 y1 < -> rle x2 y2
Disjoint_rec : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Set), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : SProp), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_rect : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Type), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Prop), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
OrderedRing.SORopp_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> req (ropp x1) (ropp x2)
OrderedRing.SORle_antisymm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m : R, rle n m -> rle m n -> req n m
OrderedRing.SORle_trans : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall n m p : R, rle n m -> rle m p -> rle n p
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
OrderedRing.SORplus_wd : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (rplus rtimes rminus : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req rle rlt : R -> R -> Prop), OrderedRing.SOR rO rI rplus rtimes rminus ropp req rle rlt -> forall x1 x2 : R, req x1 x2 -> forall y1 y2 : R, req y1 y2 -> req (rplus x1 y1) (rplus x2 y2)
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
Field_theory.PCond_app : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (l : list R) (l1 l2 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (l1 ++ l2) < -> Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1 /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l2
Field_theory.PCond_cons : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (Cpow : Type) (Cp_phi : BinNums.N -> Cpow) (rpow : R -> Cpow -> R) (l : list R) (a : Ring_polynom.PExpr C) (l1 : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C)), Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l (a :: l1) < -> ~ req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l a) rO /\ Field_theory.PCond rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req phi Cp_phi rpow l l1
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : List.Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> List.Forall2 R l l' -> List.Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') For Forall2: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_nil: Arguments A, B are implicit For Forall2_cons: Arguments A, B, R, l, l' are implicit For Forall2: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope list_scope list_scope] For Forall2_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope] For Forall2_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _ _ list_scope list_scope _ _]
ssrbool.equivalence_relP_in : forall (T : Type) (R : ssrbool.rel T) (A : ssrbool.pred T), ssrbool.prop_in3 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x y z : T => (is_true (R z z) * (is_true (R x y) -> R x z = R y z))%type) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrbool.equivalence_rel (T:=T) R)) <-> ssrbool.prop_in1 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x : T => is_true (R x x)) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrbool.reflexive (T:=T) R)) /\ ssrbool.prop_in2 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x y : T => is_true (R x y) -> ssrbool.prop_in1 (ssrbool.mem A) (P:=fun x0 : T => R x x0 = R y x0) (ssrbool.inPhantom (ssrfun.eqfun (R x) (...
Union_iff : forall (U : Type) (A B : Ensemble U) (x : U), In U (Union U A B) x < -> In U A x \/ In U B x

```coq
intros A P Q R.
split.
- intros H. split.
  + intros x Px Qx. apply H. exists x. split.
    * assumption.
    * left. assumption.
  + intros x Px Qx. apply H. exists x. split.
    * assumption.
    * right. assumption.
- intros [H1 H2] H. destruct H as [x [HR [HP | HQ]]].
  + apply H1; assumption.
  + apply H2; assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros A P Q R. split. - intros H. split. + intros x Px Qx. apply H. exists x. split. * auto. * left. auto. + intros x Px Qx. apply H. exists x. split. * auto. * right. auto. - intros [H1 H2] H. destruct H as [x [HR [HP | HQ]]]. + apply H1; auto. + apply H2; auto.
